Features

How it can be very cheap?
Bandwith & electrical currently is not that expensive, and we still at promo price
Though, support wise be handled by 1-2 staff, so dont expecting reply in minutes. On the average about 3-4 hours ticket reply time. If you need better & instant support, its best for you using managed services

What payment do you accept?
We accept PayPal, Skrill, Perfectmoney, Credit cards, Bitcoin & another cryptocurrencies
